mapper.insert: insert into meetup values((select coalesce(max(m_id),0)+1 from meetup), #{title},#{info},#{c_key},#{w_date}, #{price},#{w_id},#{imagename})
mapper.select: select * from category c left outer join (select * from meetup) m on c.c_key = m.c_key
select m.*, (select name from category c where c.c_key = m.c_key) as name from meetup m
select m.*, (select name from category c where c.c_key = m.c_key) as name from meetup m where m.m_id = #{id}
